t: Core Set 2020 - MTG Wiki
s: March 7, 2025 - Core Set 2020, also known as Core 2020, is the nineteenth Magic core set. It was released on July 12, 2019.[4] Core Set 2020 features a mix of new and reprinted cards. The set contains 280 cards (112 commons, 80 uncommons, 53 rares, 15 mythic rares, 20 basic lands) and includes randomly inserted ...
